sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { addFilter, addGender, addproduct, removeFilter, removeGender, } from "../Redux/productRedux"; import "./CSS/Sidepanel.css"; const Sidepanel = () => { const mystyle = { //styling fontWeight: 600, }; const dispatch = useDispatch(); let productArray = useSelector(state => state.productFilter.products) let filtersArray = useSelector(state => state.productFilter.filters); const [gender,setGender] = useState('') useEffect(() => { const checkbox = document.querySelectorAll(".filter-checkbox"); for (let check of checkbox) { check.addEventListener("click", function (e) { const brand = e.target.value; if (e.target.checked === true) { dispatch(addFilter({ brand })); } else { dispatch(removeFilter({ brand })); } }); } const radio = document.querySelectorAll(".filter-radiobtn"); for (let btn of radio) { btn.addEventListener("click", function (e) { // setGender(e.target.value) // console.log(gender) // if (e.target.checked) { // dispatch(addGender({ gender })); // } else { // dispatch(removeGender({ gender })); // } if(e.target.checked){ productArray.filter((item) => item.category === e.target.value).map(item => { dispatch(addproduct(...item)) }) } }); } }); return (
FILTERS
{/*styling*/}
BRAND
); }; export default Sidepanel;
